org.gjt.sp.jedit.textarea
クラス AntiAlias

java.lang.Object
  org.gjt.sp.jedit.textarea.AntiAlias

public class AntiAlias
extends java.lang.Object

Class for representing AntiAlias values. The following modes are supported: none standard lcd subpixel (JDK 1.6 only)

導入されたバージョン:
jedit 4.3pre4
作成者:
ezust
